org.apache.flink.runtime.entrypoint

类 ClusterEntrypoint

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.flink.runtime.entrypoint.ClusterEntrypoint
  • 所有已实现的接口:
    FatalErrorHandler
    直接已知子类:
    JobClusterEntrypoint, SessionClusterEntrypoint

    public abstract class ClusterEntrypoint
extends java.lang.Object
implements FatalErrorHandler
    Base class for the Flink cluster entry points.

    Specialization of this class can be used for the session mode and the per-job mode

      • onFatalError

        public void onFatalError(java.lang.Throwable exception)
        从接口复制的说明: FatalErrorHandler
        Being called when a fatal error occurs.

        IMPORTANT: This call should never be blocking since it might be called from within the main thread of an RpcEndpoint.

        指定者:
        onFatalError 在接口中 FatalErrorHandler
        参数:
        exception - cause
